初遇.encontent:
I'll take care of this case, thank you boss! I'm Nai
 Maang Dik Si, of course you'd better call me An'an.
 Let's make a fortune together!
初遇.content:
这单就由我接下喽，多谢老板～我是泥鯭的士，当然你更
好是叫我安安，有空喊我一起发财啦～

箱中气候.encontent:
It gets dark and the road gets slippery ... Take care
 when you cross the road.
箱中气候.content: 天黑路滑……过马路要留神。

致未来.encontent: More needs, more opportunities! More ghost, more possibilities!
致未来.content: 更多需求，更多机遇！更多鬼魂，更多可能～

孑立.encontent: Let me catch up some sleep ... Just a nap ...
孑立.content: 我就眯一会儿……一小会儿……

朝晨.encontent:
Hm ... Last night? I didn't go out last night, busy
 writing my blog.And then, boom! Morning!Sleep? Maybe
 in my next life ...
朝晨.content:
嗯……昨晚？昨晚没出门啦，昨晚在写博客。结果一眨眼
，Boom，早晨！下辈子再补眠好啦……

信任-朝晨.encontent: Huh? Morning ... Now leave me, I'm still sleepy ...
信任-朝晨.content: 啊？早上好……别吵我，我脑子还没醒过来……

夜暮.encontent:
I've got you some very horrible movies, and I promise
 you it's gonna be an unforgettable evening!
夜暮.content:
我准备了几张好恐怖的影碟，我敢保证，今晚绝对会让你
永生难忘！

信任-夜暮.encontent:
Hey, girl! Wanna hang out somewhere? Don't waste such
 a wonderful night!
信任-夜暮.content: 喂～靓女～一起出去玩玩啦？长夜漫漫，不可浪费哦～

帽檐与发鬓.encontent:
Whoa! Be careful, people has 3 fire of life!Ah, you
 don't say that here?
帽檐与发鬓.content: 哇！留神哇，人有三把火——啊，你们这里不说这个吗？

袖与手.encontent: What? You want a palm reading?

衣着与身形.encontent:
The yellow Taoist robe is so long, so soft and so trouble. Most
 importantly, it doesn't match my skin color!If there is no fashion
 clothes, who will trust my "Neo-Science Exorcism Office" ?
衣着与身形.content:
黄道袍又长又软，麻烦得要死，最重要的是不衬我肤色啦
！不弄出够入时的外表来，谁又会相信我们“新科学驱鬼
事务所”嘞？

嗜好.encontent:
After a ghost's reincarnation, I can get its energy. Just need
 to transform them, boil water, roast meat, make batteries, nothing
 is a problem. Especially the meat! I'll say it's No. 1 in the
 world!
嗜好.content:
鬼被度化去投胎自然有能量拿，只要稍稍转化一下，烧水
、烤肉、做电源，什么都不是问题。尤其是烤肉！味道简
直就是天下一绝！

赞赏.encontent:
Hm ... Have you considered to learn some skills? For
 example, ghost hunting? First you need to pass the
 Russian Courage training.
赞赏.content:
嗯……你有没有考虑过学一门手艺啊？比如说，捉鬼？首
先你要通过俄罗斯练胆大法的训练。

亲昵.encontent:
Seriously, you don't let me get close to the transparent
 reporter? Not even the drenched girl?
亲昵.content:
说实在的，真的不能让我接近那个半透明的记者吗？那个
湿哒哒的女孩也不行吗？

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent:
Chocolates are both a kind of snack and an anti-ghost
 weapon. Plastic wrap can catch the ghost while wrapping
 my leftovers.  A real bargain!
闲谈Ⅰ.content:
朱古力除了打鬼，还能用来当零嘴。保鲜纸除了捉鬼呢，还
能拿来包昨夜的剩菜——简直是物超所值！

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent:
The Yin-yang 3D glasses, you need to soak it in willow leaf water
 and a cow's tear, then rub it, put it under the moonlight of
 when the Yin-qi volume reaches its maximum for 49 days.If you
 want to make it, you can check my blog. It's a beginner's guide,
 but I can't guarantee you can learn it.
闲谈Ⅱ.content:
阴阳眼3D成像镜，用柳叶水和牛眼泪先浸泡再揉搓，聚
阴之时的月光晒够四十九天。你想做的话去我的博客上翻
翻吧，保姆级制作教程，包教不包会～

独白.encontent:
Ghost is not as complicated as you think. It's an ... energy
 force that couldn't be seen or touched.Even if it stands in
 front of you or actually tries to hurt you, it is just a hallucination.
 It is an effect formed by your visual nerves caused by that
 certain energy force ... Anyway, say goodbye to the stereotypes
 and there is nothing horrible.
独白.content:
鬼其实并没有你们想的那样复杂，它是一种——看不见摸
不着的能量。就算它切切实实地站在你眼前、伤害到你的
身体也一样。它们是幻觉，是能量带给视网膜神经的一种
影响——无论如何，只要你破除自己的固有观念，就没什
么是可怕的。

入队.content: 新科学驱鬼事务所，出动！

召唤至终的仪式.encontent:
So spooky, so gloomy, toplight turning dim and bright,
 that is ... so scary! Haha!
召唤至终的仪式.content:
阴森森，黑黝黝，顶灯忽明忽暗，真是……好吓人啊！哈
哈！

战斗胜利.encontent: It's now I catch you, not you catch me!
战斗胜利.content: 现在是我捉你，不是你捉我啊～

洞悉之底.encontent:
Ha! I got you!You can do anything but you choose to
 hurt people.Go listen to Lily's lesson and study again,
 reincarnate soon!
洞悉之底.content:
哈！你失手咯！做什么不好非要伤人命，去听Lily讲
道理再重学过，早日投胎啦！
